about.text: Hi, I'm Aleksandar, web and sometimes mobile app developer from Belgrade, and I like to create interesting things. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have some project or cool idea, or if you want to hang out.

oldWebsite.text: I am very proud with my old website, but it was time to update him with some new style and with modern technologies. I still want to show my first website to others. Check it out and tell me which site do you think is better.

contact.title: Have any questions? Send me a message
contact.name: Name
contact.sentError: There is problem sending message. Try again later.
